content: the x86_64 tests are the default, the other field is just for cross-compilation tests
we don't test the full matrix of rust-lang/rust, e.g. we don't have an arm64 machine to test on. There's also really not that much arch-specific stuff to warrant a need to test on other platforms

Oh, interesting! My bad. It looks in fact like _all_ other affects is this line that does rustup target add:
https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/blob/e1fb17631eb1b3665cdbe45b1c186111577ef512/.github/workflows/main.yml#L62
Jon Gjengset has marked this topic as resolved.
